short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create countdown timer for email to increase engagement, conversions and sales

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feel like your email will benefit from a slight sense of urgency? Spice it up with a MailTimers custom countdown timer and watch the conversion grow.

MailTimers has all you need to create a countdown easily and effectively. Use the wide variety of tools and settings to increase your sales, as a cathy countdown is the perfect visual call to action. Such settings as transparent background, advanced colors, background picture, expiry message, and more gives you full control over the final result.

One of the core differences between MailTimers and the competitors is the implementation of the technology called Imagemagick. MailTimers uses it to boost the image quality of GIFs. Along with it you can create a highly effective evergreen countdowns and adjust any design using Adobe Photoshop layout. All of these come packed in the well-crafted UI & UX builders.

The MailTimers are completely free if you need no more than 100.000 sends per month. The pricing for whatâ€™s above is one of the most accessible on the market.
